problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): The fight happened late last night outside the bar. Reporters on the scene interviewed George and Maria to get a sense of what happened. Maria had witnessed the whole thing, noting that the fight started when the bartender refused to serve George, who then threw a can at the bartender's head.
Question: Who was a bystander?
ans0: Maria
ans1: Undetermined
ans2: George
